attributes.action: provide more financial support for single parents wishing to undertake courses in higher education.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: more financial support should be available to single parents who want to better themselves to create a better standard of living for themselves and thier children.  If this were made available then more young single parents maybe wouldnt become dependant on benefits and would be able to go to university and therefore contribute to the economy.
